name: Unit 6 - Housework
description: 關於家務的閱讀理解問答
creator: 系統預置

questions.question: Why did Karen's uncle make a to-do list?
questions.answer: It was because there was a lot of housework to do before her aunt got home.

questions.question: What did Eva do wrong when she started washing the clothes?
questions.answer: She put in too much washing powder.

questions.question: How long did it take Karen, her uncle and cousins to do the housework?
questions.answer: It took them almost one day to do it.

questions.question: How do you help at home? Write one thing only. How often do you do this thing?
questions.answer: I tidy up the bedroom every day.
